rounds.comments: (Alex: One or the other, or perhaps both, will appear in the correct response, not necessarily both.)

clues.text: It's said you're cultured if you can hear this & not think of the Lone Ranger
From 1936 film, "Born to Dance", this Cole Porter standard sounds like a dermatological condition
It precedes "It's time to call it a day, they've burst your pretty balloon & taken the moon away"
This 1976 Diana Ross song sounds like she OD'd on romance & was paying for it the morning after
1963 hit for Dionne Warwick, or a refusal of a cosmetician's offer
Of guilty or not guilty, the verdict in Lizzie Borden's murder trial
Rumors said this French queen sold herself to a cardinal for a diamond necklace
Though of Jewish descent, he became the 1st Grand Inquisitor of Spain
The eyes of 1 of Jack the Ripper's victims were photographed by police in this mistaken belief
clues.response: the murderer's reflection was to be found in the eyes

clues.text: Clytemnestra killed this husband after she fell in love with his cousin Aegisthus
In his last years, he was so desperate for money that he had to offer up his Civil War swords

First Lady suspected of disloyalty because her brothers were Confederate soldiers

Latin American country named for the Aztec god of war

The earthquake that devastated Armenia was also felt in this country, its neighbor to the west

By law you must have this piece of personal I.D. with you whenever you drive
It's best to use these sparingly when driving downhill: they may get hot & lose power
To alert other drivers, it's best to do this at least 5 seconds before changing lanes
A flashing red light means you must do this before proceeding
A solid double yellow line means you're not allowed to do this
Mythical beast whose name is derived from the Latin for "having 1 horn"
This "Dutch" flower's name comes from the Turkish for turban because it resembles a turban

Though its name comes from the Italian for "high" it's the lowest female singing voice
From the Malay words for "man" & "forest", it's the name of an ape the height of a small man
He exclaimed, "Oh dear! Oh dear! I shall be too late!" before he popped down a hole
At the mad tea party, these 2 tried to stuff the Dormouse into the teapot
clues.response: the Mad Hatter & the March Hare

clues.response: the Chicago Museum of Science and Industry

2 of the 4 most widely spoken languages in the world

rounds.text: This sport that made its Olympic debut in 1988 has a playing surface of only about 45 square feet
